response.original_title: The World is on Fire and I Just Want to Dance
response.overview: During the apocalypse, a worldwide fire and a looming alien invasion causes best friends Astrid and Ivy to be stuck inside their separate homes. During a phone call when their situations have become unbearable, they decide to meet up in a virtual reality world to fulfill their last desires together.
response.title: The World is on Fire and I Just Want to Dance
